page.title: 19SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: {SOCIAL LIFE { Lara McIlroy,}a seventeen year old living in{Ballyrashane},would go out once a fortnight on a weekday.She goes to{Coleraine Rugby Club,}to a friend's house or out for a meal.At the weekend she goes to discos{eg.Trak's,Portrush. She goes to{Coleraine}quite a lot as she attends school and works there on Saturdays.She prefers Coleraine as it has a{cinema,a leisure centre and the {best shops in the area. As she can now drive,travel is not inconvenient even though buses are irregular.Only 2_3 buses pass daily. Lara and her family regularly attend{ {Ballywillan Church,Portrush,}and her father is a member of the choir and church committee, and is captain of the bowling club. The family sometimes go abroad for a few weeks during the summer holidays.
